task.title: Printing and Exporting
task.shortdesc: Trelloâ€™s Print and Export feature is available to board creators and collaborators. To access this feature, natigate to Board Menu > More > Print and Export. The Export feature allows boards to be exported in JSON format, which uses text to store and exchange data. The Print feature produces a printable version of your board including all lists and cards.

context.p: Use the Print feature to develop a hard copy of the layout of your board. Use the Export feature to export the content of your board into other programs, or to backup your data for safety.

step.cmd: Nagivate to the board that you would like to print or export.
On the top right of the board, click Show Menu
Select More from the list of options.
Click Print and Export. In the drop down menu, select Print... to print your board structure, or select Export as JSON to export your data.
